name: load_scenario
description: if True, loads existing scenario (path required); if False, a random scenario is generated

name: results_path
description: path to where results are saved

name: scenario_path
description: path to where the scenario is stored

name: data_format
description: data format of inputs and results

name: nb_actors
description: number of actors in the simulation

name: nb_nodes
description: number of nodes in the simulation

name: weight_factor
description: network charges to power network weight

name: EPS
description: tolerance value for assertions, comparisons etc.
